dialogue: Can you recommend a good microphone for my iPad?
Yes, I'll send you a link.
This one only works on laptops.
No, that also only works on laptops.
Okay, I got it. Here's one.
Nope. That is another microphone that doesn't work on an iPad.
Listen to me closely. My main requirement is that it work on an iPad.
Oh, okay, I got it. Here's one.
Does it work on an iPad?
I didn't say it was perfect.
